description:
Working from home has gone from being a growing trend to a full-scale phenomenon. There are many perks to a work-from-home arrangement, to be sure, but there can also be downsides: For example, there’s a good chance you’ll need to supply your own monitor. Fortunately, there are many great home office monitors to choose from, as I’ve discovered through extensive real-world testing.

Below you’ll find my picks for the best home office monitors, and below that you can learn more about what specs and features matter when shopping for a home office monitor.

For even more monitor recommendations, check out our roundups of the best monitors and the
title: Best home office monitors 2024: Displays that get the job done

description:
Huge palaces appear on the map in Sid Meier’s Civilization 7. We see beautiful gardens, soldiers patrolling, and the pharaoh Hatshepsut walking up the palace steps guarded by huge statues of Anubis.

This is a different Civ feel, one with the charm of Anno 117. A city is not just symbolized here as in Civilization VII with a few houses and landmarks, but we can see and feel it. We can drive to the harbor, where fishing boats are bringing in the next catch, while Egyptian warships patrol the coast.
title: Civilization VII in preview: The old Civ love with the charm of Anno 117

description:
Elgato has now launched its largest Stream Deck yet, the Elgato Stream Deck Studio. The live streaming tool features a whopping 32 programmable LCD buttons in two rows as well as a pair of rotary dials. This compares to Elgato’s original Stream Deck, which has 15 buttons. The Deck Studio, however, is intended specifically for professional users and traditional studio broadcasters.

The Elgato Stream Deck Studio measures almost half a meter in length and connects with a single USB-C input on the front. There are also two more USB-C ports on the back, one of which offers connection to a PC and another can be used to power the device instead of the Stream Deck Studio’s 25W Ethernet connection. It’s also possible to connect several Elgato Stream Deck Studios to each other.

It’s currently priced at $899.99 and is
title: Elgato launches a giant Stream Deck for professionals

description:
What’s the most important component in a laptop or desktop? Probably not the storage drive — but that doesn’t mean you should overlook it. In fact, a great drive can elevate your computer with instant bootup times, quicker app loads, faster file transfers, and more.

And now that this speedy 1TB Samsung 990 Pro SSD is on sale for just $100 on Amazon, there’s never been a better time to upgrade your computer’s storage drive. Whether you have a sluggish HDD or a decent SSD, this super-performant upgrade is better. Guaranteed.

When we reviewed the Samsung 990 Pro, we gave it 4
title: Samsung’s ultra-fast 990 Pro SSD is flawless now that it’s 38% off

description:
Microsoft Teams is Microsoft’s platform for business-oriented communication via chat, audio calls, and video calls. The service is part of Microsoft 365 and often comes already integrated with work PCs, especially if you’re part of a company that relies on Microsoft apps.

You might even find that Teams automatically opens whenever you boot or restart your computer. This could be helpful if you’re always on Teams and use it a lot… but what if you don’t? Maybe it’s slowing down your startup times and you want to disable this behavior.

Fortunately, you can. Here’s what you can do if you don’t want Microsoft Teams to automatically launch at startup.

Related: Quick
title: How to stop Microsoft Teams from automatically launching at startup

description:
If you’re looking for a fantastic laptop, then the Samsung Galaxy Book4 Pro is one you’ll love, especially when it’s on sale for $1,150 at Amazon, down from its MSRP of $1,450. That $300 discount is pretty nice for a laptop that we really love.

In our review of the Samsung Galaxy Book4 Pro, we gave it a rating of 4.5 out of 5 stars and our Editors’ Choice award, praising the laptop’s outstanding OLED screen, its barely-there weight, its great keyboard, and — surprisingly — its built-in camera.

“When it comes to the Galax
title: Samsung’s Galaxy Book4 Pro productivity laptop is at its lowest price

description:
I always love spotting great deals on power banks because I truly think they’re must-have accessories. Everyone deserves the peace of mind in knowing that their phones and laptops won’t die mid-day.

If you don’t have a power bank yet, here’s a solid one to start with: Baseus’s 20,000mAh power bank is on sale for $41 on Amazon, which is nearly half off its usual price. Pretty good for a high-capacity portable charger that’s still compact enough to carry around comfortably.

The 20,000mAh capacity is enough to fully charge an iPhone 15 or Galaxy S23 Ultra from zero to full over 3 times. It’s also enough to fully charge a dead MacBook Pro (yes, it’s great for laptops, too).

But this power bank isn’t just large — it’s also fast. It has a 6
title: This high-capacity, fast-charging power bank is 49% off right now

description:
Microsoft will discontinue extended support for Windows 10 in October 2025. From then on, the operating system will no longer receive any updates, including security updates. In view of the current security situation, this poses a major threat.

get windows 11 pro for cheap

Windows 11 Pro
title: Want to safely use Windows 10 after Microsoft ends support? Meet 0Patch

description:
For PC gamers, Steam has been such a mainstay for so long now that it’s practically melded into the operating system itself. The thing is, Steam is more than just a market — it can do a lot more.

Just because you’ve used Steam a lot doesn’t mean you know everything about it. Valve has continued to update its flagship product over the years with several intriguing and downright useful features, and it’s a real shame that many of those features fly under the radar.

So, I dug through some of Valve’s recent announcements and explored the software from end to end. Here are some cool Steam features I found that you might’ve overlooked.

Play Steam games on your TV or phone

Steam is a PC gaming platform, but you aren’t limited to your PC. With Valve’s own <
title: 11 hidden Steam features that PC gamers shouldn’t overlook

description:
Quick Answer: Can You Screen Record on Peacock?

Yes, you can. Peacock Premium enables Premium or Premium Plus to watch hit movies, full seasons of iconic TV shows, Peacock’s original series, the latest hits from NBC and Bravo, live sports, daily live news, etc. Unsubscribed users cannot enjoy the service provided by Peacock.

  • To record Peacock live sports and shows on Windows or Mac, try this reliable third-party screen recorder: EaseUS RecExperts.
  • iPhone and Android users can use the corresponding built-in screen-recording feature to record on Peacock.

Peacock is an online streaming platform with a wide range of content, and PC and phone users can record videos after subscribing
title: How to Record Peacock on PCs, iPhone, and Android with Ease

description:
Keeping up with SEO for your business or brand can feel like a full-time job in itself, but SiteGuru makes it easy. With a lifetime subscription, you get an all-in-one toolkit that helps you optimize your website without needing to be an expert — on sale for $69.

Whether you’re a small business owner or a freelancer looking to boost your online presence, SiteGuru simplifies the process by providing clear, actionable SEO reports.

Unlike other platforms that drown you in jargon, SiteGuru breaks down complex data into easy-to-follow recommendations
title: Boost your website’s visibility with SiteGuru’s lifetime SEO tools

description:

With its powerful 360° HD sound, this speaker fills any space with booming audio, whether you’re at a beach bonfire, camping trip, or just grilling in the backyard. The dual subwoofers make sure that every beat hits hard, and your music sounds full and rich from all angles. 

This Bluetooth speaker is designed to survive your wildest adventures. It’s waterproof, shockproof, and dustproof, so you don’t have to worry about the ele
title: Pump up the party with 360° sound from this discounted TREBLAB Bluetooth speaker
